Summary: The database master file (tab-sep;supply whole path)
The headers and order for each column in output file. The information can also be recorded in the db master file as "#outinfo:ColumnName=0_2,..,ColumnNameN=N_N".
Merge all entries found within db files. Unique entries (not found in first db file) will be included. Does not support range matching.
Select all entries in first infile matching keys in subsequent db files. Does not support range matching.
Selected variants and orphan db files out data directory. (Supply whole path(s) and in the same order as the '-db' db file)
